name: Sports Collection: 15 Sports to Master
overview: Sports Collection was released on October 5, 2010. It was published by Ubisoft for NDS. Get ready to master the world’s most popular sports and become a sports legend! Compete in 15 diverse sports, from baseball to ice climbing, as you win coins, earn metals, and unlock exciting new levels in this arcade-style sports challenge. Make your way across the globe in this ultimate test of your strength, energy and speed!
